com.sebastiandine.cardcollectionmanager.container

Class EditionBeanContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sebastiandine.cardcollectionmanager.container.AbstractBeanContainer
      • com.sebastiandine.cardcollectionmanager.container.EditionBeanContainer

  • public class EditionBeanContainer
extends AbstractBeanContainer
    This container class provides holds a list of EditionBean objects and provides methods for interaction with this list.
    Author:
    Sebastian Dine

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addEditionBean(EditionBean editionBean)
      This method adds a EditionBean object to the internal list of EditionBean objects.
      static void deleteEditionBeanById(int id)
      This method deletes the EditionBean element with the given 'id' from the internal list of EditionBean objects.
      static EditionBean[] getEditionBeanList()
      This method returns the internal list of EditionBean objects as an array.
      static void saveEditionBeanList()
      This method saves the current internal list of CardBean objects to the local system.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • addEditionBean

        public static void addEditionBean(EditionBean editionBean)
        This method adds a EditionBean object to the internal list of EditionBean objects.
        Parameters:
        editionBean - Predefined EditionBean object. Attribute 'id' will be defined by this method so it does not need to be predefined.

      • deleteEditionBeanById

        public static void deleteEditionBeanById(int id)
        This method deletes the EditionBean element with the given 'id' from the internal list of EditionBean objects.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the EditionBean element which should be deleted from the internal list. Use EditionBean.getId() to retrieve the id of a target object.

      • getEditionBeanList

        public static EditionBean[] getEditionBeanList()
        This method returns the internal list of EditionBean objects as an array.
        Returns:
        Array with all internal EditionBean objects.

      • saveEditionBeanList

        public static void saveEditionBeanList()
        This method saves the current internal list of CardBean objects to the local system. The save destination is defined by property 'url_carddata' in config file 'config/config.properties'.
